description: One of the most delicious pasta dishes ever!
name: Creamy Fettuccine Boscaiola Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Put a dry pan on high heat and cook the bacon.

Meanwhile bring a saucepan full of water to the boil, so you can cook the fettuccine. Add salt to the boiling water and after a minute then add fettuccine to the boiling water and cook for about 8 minutes until al dente.
Add mushrooms, butter and garlic to the bacon, stirring to coat the mushrooms in the butter. Grind a good amount of pepper over the mushrooms.
Reduce heat to medium and once mushrooms are just about cooked, add the cream plus about 1 tbs of the parmesan to the bacon pan, stir and reduce.
Drain cooked fettuccine and add to bacon pan then top with shallot and herbs, and stir through before serving ASAP.
Once on serving plates, grind more pepper on top and add more shaved parmesan, then eat.
